Reference

All functions

bernoulli()

Bernoulli family for mcp

check_integer()

Throws an error if a number/vector contains non-numeric, decimal, or less-than-lower

criterion() loo(<mcpfit>) waic(<mcpfit>)

Compute information criteria for model comparison

expandDoubleVerts()

Expand terms with '||' notation into separate '|' terms

findbars()

Determine random-effects expressions from a formula

fixef()

Get population-level ("fixed") effects of mcpfit.

get_formula_str()

Build an R formula (as string) given a segment table (ST)

get_func_y()

Turn formula_str into a proper R function

get_jagscode()

Make JAGS code for Multiple Change Point model

get_jags_data()

Adds helper variables for use in run_jags

get_prior()

Get priors for all parameters in a segment table.

get_prior_str()

Get JAGS code for a prior

get_segment_table()

Build a table describing a list of segments

get_summary()

Internal function for summary.mcpfit, fixef.mcpfit, and ranef.mcpfit

logical0_to_null()

Converts logical(0) to null. Returns x otherwise

mcp()

Fit Multiple Linear Segments And Their Change Points

nobars()

Omit terms separated by vertical bars in a formula

plot(<mcpfit>)

Plot mcpfit

plot_bayesplot()

Plot mcpfit objects with bayesplot

plot_segments()

Plot posterior draws of segments on top of data

print(<mcpfit>)

Print mcpfit

ranef()

Get varying ("random") effects of mcpfit.

recover_levels()

Recover the levels of varying effects in mcmc.list

run_jags()

Run parallel MCMC sampling using JAGS.

sd_to_prec()

¨Transform a prior from SD to precision.

summary(<mcpfit>)

Summarise mcpfit objects

unpack_cp()

Takes a cp formula (as astring) and returns its properties
